glsa.title: Pioneers: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Pioneers, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service.

background.p: Pioneers (formerly gnocatan) is a clone of the popular board game "The Settlers of Catan".

description.p: Bas Wijnen discovered that the Pioneers server may free sessions objects while they are still in use, resulting in access to invalid memory zones.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted data to the vulnerable server, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Pioneers users should upgrade to the latest version:
